description:
10 questions. Get as many as you can correct to win!

**- Join (Team Name)**
Joins a Quiz Night. Enter an existing team name to join that one.

**- QuizNight Start**
Starts a Quiz Night with 30 seconds for players to join.

**- QuizNight Days**
Set which days Quiz Nights should be on.

**- QuizNight Time**
Set the time (UTC) Quiz Nights should start. Supports 12 hour (AM/PM) and 24 hour clocks.

**- QuizNight Roles**
Specify roles that can join Quiz Nights. Everyone can join by default.

 **- QuizNight Ping**
Enables/disables pinging for quizzes.
